attributes.additional_details: BECAUSE THE BBC HAS ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS PROMOTED MISLEADING NEWS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC
attributes.background: CANCEL THE BBC LICENCE FEE AS THE BBC IS NOT ACTING IMPARTIALLY IN THE INTERESTS OF THE BRITISH PEOPLE.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
